events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position in our development team.
The application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster as the role involves software development.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles was assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process.
The initial screening call went well, discussing the candidate's experience in software engineering and project involvement.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong enthusiasm for the opportunity to join our engineering team.
A technical interview with the lead developer has been scheduled to assess the candidate's coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in software engineering principles.
The HR interview was scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and salary expectations with the candidate.
The HR interview was completed successfully, with the candidate showing alignment with company values and expectations.
An offer for the Software Engineer position was proposed to the candidate, including compensation details and start date suggestions.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining the team.
The candidate officially accepted the offer, confirming the start date and completing the recruitment process successfully.
The candidate started the onboarding process, completing initial training and setup to join the engineering department.
The recruitment cycle for the Software Engineer role was successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded.
